channel.title: Error when tryin to import rscd v.25
channel.description:
I get this error when im trying to import the RSCD Database can someone help me??:
SQL query:
-- -- Database: `rscd` -- -- -------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Table structure for table `bans` -- CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bans` (
`id` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `username` varchar( 200 ) default NULL , `ip` varchar( 255 ) default NULL , `email` varchar( 50 ) default NULL , `message` varchar( 255 ) default NULL , `expire` int( 10 ) unsigned default NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT =1;
MySQL said:
#1046 - No database selected

item.title: Error when tryin to import rscd v.25
item.dc:creator: @_Halloween ~Halloween~
item.description:
@_Halloween wrote:

EDIT: wow im an idiot i forgot all about the world folder i didn’t edit shit in there =p well thanks for your help again.

EDIT: this has no user credential unlike demonik/ divine. How would i make myself admin on this?

item.title: Error when tryin to import rscd v.25
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote="~Halloween~, post:8, topic:230318"]all the setting are correct and the web server is up and running perfectly. When i click on Run_lserver the screen says:

Login server starting up…
connected to mysql
loginengine now running

but i still get that tryin to connect to LS[/quote]Then you must be doing something wrong.

@_Halloween wrote:

I get this error when im trying to import the RSCD Database can someone help me??:

SQL query:

–
– Database: rscd

–
– Table structure for table bans

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bans (

id int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
username varchar( 200 ) default NULL ,
ip varchar( 255 ) default NULL ,
email varchar( 50 ) default NULL ,
message varchar( 255 ) default NULL ,
expire int( 10 ) unsigned default NULL ,
PRIMARY KEY ( id )
) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT =1;
